title: Businessweek Extra - Rob LoCascio
itunes:title: Businessweek Extra - Rob LoCascio
description:
Hosted by Carol Massar and Jason Kelly.

Featuring an in-depth conversation with Rob LoCascio, CEO of LivePerson, on how AI-powered messaging is serving people working from home
